item.title: Live - document dump: How Govt was flying blind over Covid-19 patients breaking rules
item.description: The Government was flying mostly blind on how essential workers were being protected during the alert level 4 lockdown or whether people with Covid-19, or suspected of having Covid-19, were properly keeping ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202019/02042020NZHSWliquor07_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Cabinet was advised liquor shops could operate in a similar manner as supermarkets but the Government rejected the advice. Photo / NZME
